title: S3 E7 LtCol(R) John Griffin - YOU can innovate for SOCOM
description: Have you ever had an idea to fix a problem from deployment or training but didn't know how to make that solution a reality?  Northeastern University Program Director for the National Security Innovation Network (NSIN), retired Marine Lieutenant Colonel John Griffin talks about how NSIN is meeting the needs of the DoD with problem solvers from academia, business, and from within the ranks of our service members! Find out how you can bring your innovation to life and still retain the rights to your idea. All that and more on this episode of SOFcast.   Subscribe to SOFcast today! Also available on YouTube!
itunes:author: US Special Operations Command
